Description: work towards your business objectives with new products_ features_ or integrations
Example: implement new tools/platform_ try new approach to solve issues_ etc.

Description: improvements to existing features (including improvements in performance_ reliability_ and security)
Example: performance improvements_ improve reliability and usability_ etc.

Description: mostly improvements to SRE/developer productivity but engineering organizations can also help scale many company operations
Example: developer toolings_ infra improvements for future growth_ create automation to reduce toil_ etc.

Description: necessary efforts to keep the current system operational
Example: bug_ troubleshooting_ dependency updates_ routine tasks_ handling incidents_ etc.
